snippet: The presence of former President Bill Clinton and former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton at Mayor Bill de Blasio’s inauguration signals an alliance that could prove mutually beneficial.
abstract: Political strategists say presence of former President Bill Clinton and former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton at inauguration of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio signals alliance that could prove mutually beneficial; former president swore in de Blasio as city's 109th mayor.
lead_paragraph: The presence of former President Bill Clinton and former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton at Mayor Bill de Blasio’s inauguration signals an alliance that could prove mutually beneficial.

headline.main: With Clintons in His Corner, de Blasio Bolsters Ties to His Party’s ‘Gold Standard’
headline.print_headline: With Clintons in His Corner, de Blasio Bolsters Ties to His Party’s ‘Gold Standard’
